data.comment: Jonathan Herrera (Atlas) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
Today's referee, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo, has blown to start the match.
Cruz Azul's Juan Escobar breaks free at Estadio Jalisco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 1, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Cruz Azul.
Jose Abella for Atlas drives towards goal at Estadio Jalisco. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In Guadalajara Cruz Azul attack through Jonathan Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Atlas a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Atlas.
Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Jalisco.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 21, Atlas's Javier Correa is on target but unsuccessful.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
In Guadalajara Atlas's German Conti is caught offside.
Igor Lichnovsky for Cruz Azul has been booked by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 26, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luis Romo (Cruz Azul) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Atlas.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Atlas.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Cruz Azul in their own half.
In the minute 31, Jesus Angulo (Atlas) has received a first yellow card.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 34, Juan Escobar for Cruz Azul gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
Juan Escobar of Cruz Azul gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
Free kick for Atlas in the half of Cruz Azul.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Can Atlas capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Atlas's Javier Correa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cruz Azul defender.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Atlas throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
In the minute 42, Free kick Atlas.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 44, Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Estadio Jalisco.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Atlas's half.
In the minute 50, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Can Atlas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cruz Azul's half?
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 53, German Conti gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atlas.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Atlas.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
In the minute 60, Cruz Azul's Rafael Baca misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Atlas a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Robert Siboldi (Cruz Azul) is making a first substitution, with Roberto Alvarado replacing Yoshimar Yotun.
Elias Hernandez is on a sub for Santiago Gimenez for Cruz Azul.
Cruz Azul drives forward and Elias Hernandez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Atlas in the half of Cruz Azul.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
In the minute 68, Atlas's German Conti gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
In the minute 70, An attacking Atlas player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Rafael Baca (Cruz Azul) has received a yellow card from Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Ignacio Malcorra smashes in a penalty at Estadio Jalisco. The score is now 1-0.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Diego Cocca is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Jalisco with Angel Marquez replacing Renato Ibarra.
Cruz Azul are coming forward and Adrian Aldrete gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Atlas.
Alexis Gutierrez is replacing Rafael Baca for Cruz Azul at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 77, Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul at Estadio Jalisco.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Orbelin Pineda with Misael Dominguez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Robert Siboldi.
Robert Siboldi is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Jalisco with Milton Caraglio replacing Juan Escobar.
Atlas make their second substitution with Ignacio Jeraldino replacing Javier Correa.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Atlas in Guadalajara.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atlas close to the penalty box.
In the minute 83, Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Jesus Isijara with Jonathan Herrera. This is the third substitution made today by Diego Cocca.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Atlas.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Atlas a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
Atlas are pushing forward but Jonathan Herrera's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Atlas have a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Alan Reyes is replacing Luciano Acosta for the home team.
